product_name: Continental X-King ProTection 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: Continental X-King ProTection 29er foldable tire is tubeless-ready and offers a high level of all-around performance for cross-country to all-mountain mountain biking. Tubeless-ready design has UST-style folding beads with a supple 4-ply, 240 tpi casing for enhanced longevity and air-tightness. ProTection construction adds a layer of strong, rubber-coated nylon that spans the width of the tire, delivering robust puncture protection. Combined with sealant (sold separately), ProTection models deliver low-pressure tubeless performance with improved damping, traction and rolling characteristics. Black Chili rubber compound offers an impressive level of long-lasting, grippy and fast-rolling performance for all-around use. Self-cleaning tread pattern rolls fast along the center and has shoulder lugs that confidently hold turns at speed. Continental X-King ProTection 29er foldable tire fits 29er wheels and has a recommended pressure of 50 psi (max 65 psi).
short_description: Continental X-King ProTection 29er foldable tire is tubeless-ready and offers a high level of all-around performance for cross-country to all-mountain mountain biking.
